edu.ucla.wise.commons

Class WISEApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.wise.commons.WISEApplication
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdminApplication, SurveyorApplication, SurveyorSpec

    public class WISEApplication
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to represent common elements for a given installation of the wise surveyor or admin java application. Never instantiated; Handles most interfaces to the file system

    • Method Detail

      • sendEmail

        @Deprecated
public static void sendEmail(java.lang.String email_to,
                        java.lang.String subject,
                        java.lang.String body)
        Deprecated. 
        Send an email alert to someone. Older version of this application used to send email alert for every error. This would flood inbox trememdously. Replaced this by logging errors, an industry standard of recording events having in an application.
        Parameters:
        email_to - Email Id to whom mail has to be sent.
        subject - Subject of the Email.
        body - Body of the Email.
